DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and PK of AZD1446 in Subjects when given as multiple dose administration for either 7 Days (Day 1 single dose, Day 2-6 multiple doses) in Part A and optionally at fractionated doses for 1 Day in Part B.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics With Single and Multiple Ascending Doses of AZD1446
DOC.criteria: Male or nonfertile female, young or elderly Subjects, aged ≥18 to ≤50 or ≥65 to ≤80 Body mass index (BMI) between 19 and 30 kg/m2 Clinically normal findings on physical examination History of any clinically significant disease or disorder History of severe allergy/hypersensitivity reactions
DOC.keyword: to investigate safety and tolerability in a multiple ascending dose study in Healthy subjects
